title: Matt Warman – 2021 Comments on Digital Identities
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Matt Warman, the Digital Infrastructure Minister, on 2 August 2021.
content:
Whether someone wants to prove who they are when starting a job, moving house or shopping online, they ought to have the tools to do so quickly and securely.
